scenario_text.value:
I am ashamed. Had I only been more vigilant,
Aoi would still be with us...

It’s not your fault, Falcomon. Don’t beat
yourself up about it.
We just have to hurry and find her.

You are correct. It will not absolve me, but
I shall dedicate my all to the search!

I shall dedicate my all to the search. Leave
this to me!
